name: Tinkaton
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.

abilities.name: Gather Materials
abilities.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Special Hammer
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, this attack does 90 more damage.
